marklogic.body: Sorry to hear about the little guy, and you guys for that matter, going through this ordeal. All I remember about my tenure with chicken pox in the old days is sitting in a bathtub (since clothing bothered the Itch) crying with oven mits on my hands and my mom screaming at me when I tried to take them Off, so yeah, it sucks big time. I wonder if the fact that he caught the infection even with the vaccine has made it worse? He definitely looks to have a pretty nasty case. Anyway, good luck to you all and I hope it gets better soon!
